Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI

Class TUI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.Utilities.UI
it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI.TUI
public class TUI extends UI
TUI (Textual User Interface) class extending the UI class.
